text:
@gregggonsalves @realDonaldTrump Let’s be super-clear: The protests, riots and looting that took place (without masks!) 3 weeks ago is the cause of this. 

Also, tracers are forbidden from asking if COVID19-positive people participated in the protest, riots and looting. So, we’ll never know (but we do know).
